ctrl_click.title: Ctrl click
ctrl_click.description: If 'true', ctrl+click on a field to edit.

outline.title: Outline
outline.description: If 'true', add a blue outline around the field when it is in edit mode.

process_paste.title: Process paste
process_paste.description: When pasting, save images locally, strip unnecessary HTML formatting, etc. Experimental and officially only support 2.1.19. Set it to 'false' if you encounter errors regarding `editorwv` on paste.

remove_span.title: Remove span
remove_span.description: When editing on reviewer, will remove all span tags. If you rely on span tags, do not set this to true or they will all be deleted. Most users who don't need span tags are recommended to set it to true.

resize_image_default_state.title: Resize Image Default State
resize_image_default_state.description:
Whether image resizing mode should be turned on by default. 
 You can toggle the image resizing mode by pressing Alt + S.

resize_image_preserve_ratio.title: Preserve ratio
resize_image_preserve_ratio.description: Whether to preserve ratio when using south-east corner to resize image

undo.title: Undo
undo.description: Whether the last field edit should be undo-able.

tag.title: Tag
tag.description: Which HTML tag to use for editable field.
